content: knitted jumper in drops wish the piece is worked bottom up with english rib open garter stitch and split in the sides sizes s - xxxl pattern wi-054 yarn group e or c + c **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials ** drops wish from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 450-500-550-600-650-750 g colour 14 sea green needles drops circular needle size 9 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 8 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 9 mm drops double pointed needles size 8 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 10 stitches in width and 14 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
